definitions.definition: The state or condition of being depraved ; moral debasement .
A particular depraved act or trait .
Inborn corruption , entailing the belief that every facet of human nature has been polluted , defiled , and contaminated by sin .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state or condition of being depraved ; moral debasement .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A particular depraved act or trait .
( uncountable , Christian theology ) Inborn corruption , entailing the belief that every facet of human nature has been polluted , defiled , and contaminated by sin .
